body_content.explanation: a measurement of the concentration of a substance (= how much of it there is) in an amount of blood:
examples: It is important that vets have rabies antibody titres checked every two years.
If a pregnant patient’s rubella titre is less than 1:8, she should be immunized after delivering the baby.
A protective effect was observed among infants born to mothers with high titres.
This test could not detect pigs with low titres of antibody.

body_content.explanation: a measurement of the concentration of a substance (= how much of it there is) in an amount of liquid:
examples: In this unit you will be taught how to calculate the titre of a solution.
In this video I explain how to calculate the mean titre from a set of titration results.
